select * from (select N.*, rownum R from (select * from (select A.*, B.city_name city_name, C.t_title t_title, D.cate_name cate_name from goods A, nationinfo B, theme C, category D where A.city_num = B.city_num and A.t_num = C.t_num and A.cate_num = D.cate_num) order by goods_num desc) N) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}

select count(goods_num) from (select A.*, B.city_name city_name, C.t_title t_title, D.cate_name cate_name from goods A, nationinfo B, theme C, category D where A.city_num = B.city_num and A.t_num = C.t_num and A.cate_num = D.cate_num)
